name: 🍂🎃Pumpkin Spice Nurse McHurt🎃🍂
text: Lmao I've been bitching over on Mastodon about how it's never going to be more than a niche techy thing since it's pretty unfriendly to anyone without more than a passing interest in indieweb shit But this guy puts it way better.
